title: Investigate Cazador's Palace
content:
ning and resultant trepidation. He empathizes with their coerced compliance under Cazador's will. He references Seven Sigils held by seven spawns, with Cazador in possession of six. Confronting him becomes imperative to seize the power. Your response can be:

Sacrificing your siblings? Are you willing? Why not maintain distance? Cazador's ritual hinges on finding you. 'Ourselves'? Perhaps you mean yourself. At times, your intimidation surpasses the elder brain's. Let's proceed.

Opt for the thir
